title: Aircraft Noise Reports
description: A. SUMMARY This dataset consists of San Francisco International Airport (SFO) aircraft noise reports and if available, the correlated flight operation’s details for those reports. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED SFO Noise Office collects this information via the WebTrak, Web, App, Complaint Hotline, emails, letters, and telephone calls to our office. This information is compiled and published in a monthly report which is presented at the SFO Airport Community Roundtable meetings (https://sforoundtable.org/). It serves to help understand community's aircraft noise concerns, to collaborate with all stakeholders in an effort to reduce and manage aircraft noise. C. UPDATE PROCESS Data is available starting in August 2019 and will be updated on a monthly basis. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET This data is the data source used to produce the Noise Reports section on page 5 of the monthly Airport Director’s Report. These reports are available online at https://www.flysfo.com/about/community-noise/noise-office/reports/airport-directors-report E. RELATED DATASETS Previously provided data, Aircraft Noise Complaint Data, from January 2005 to July 2019 is available here: https://data.sfgov.org/Transportation/Aircraft-Noise-Complaint-Data/q3xd-hfi8 Please contact the Noise Abatement Office at NoiseAbatementOffice@flysfo.com for any questions regarding this data.

columns.name: disturbance_date_time
columns.description: Date time of the aircraft noise disturbance.

columns.name: report_method
columns.description: The method used to report the noise disturbance: app, email, telephone, Web or WebTrak.

columns.name: corr_id
columns.description: Number that links a noise report record to a flight operation.

columns.name: aircraft_pca_altitude
columns.description: The altitude of the correlated aircraft.  It is calculated between the flight track’s point-of-closest approach to the Reporter’s location, in feet.

columns.name: airport_id
columns.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 3-letter location identifier for the airport the flight originated from or arriving to.

columns.name: operation_type
columns.description: Identifies the flight operation: A=Arrival, D=Departure, O=Overflight, G=Ground, T=Touch&Go.

columns.name: runway_name
columns.description: The name of the runway the aircraft operated on.

columns.name: flight_no
columns.description: Flight ID associated with a flight operation.

columns.name: aircraft_type
columns.description: Type of aircraft used for the flight operation.

columns.name: destination_origin
columns.description: International Air Transport Association (IATA) 3-letter location identifier for the airport the flight is bound for or originating from.

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Date and time source data was updated.

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Date the data was loaded onto the Open Data Portal
